text: The flag of Cali () is the main official symbol of the city of Santiago de Cali, in Valle del Cauca department. In 1928 the flag of Cali was created by order of Nicol√°s Ramos Hidalgo. It became official on May 31, 1954. The city's flag has horizontal stripes of white, green, blue and red. It was adopted 1954. ==References== Cali
title: Flag of Cali
